name: Void Ravager
description: A terrifying predator of the Void, consuming Light and leaving only darkness in its wake.
lore: <cite>"They do not hunt for hunger. They do not kill for sport. They exist to unmake, to consume, to drag all that shines into the abyss."</cite> —Aldric Holloway

stats.Attack Behavior: Prefers ambush attacks, jumping to evade retaliation.

name: Otyugh
description: A lingering anomaly from a lost era, its spore-infested body births endless horrors in the dark.
lore: <cite>"It should not exist. The world moved on. The Void swallowed all. And yet, it lingers—festering, spreading, defying time itself."</cite> —Scholar from a Lost World

stats.Attack Behavior: Spews spider-infested spores, weakening prey before dragging them into its lair.

name: Void Mites
description: Tiny, insect-like creatures that swarm around sources of magical light, feeding on energy until only darkness remains.
lore: <cite>"First, the lantern flickered. Then, it died. And in the darkness, I heard them—chittering, crawling, hungry for more."</cite> —Lost Traveler’s Journal

stats.Attack Behavior: Swarm targets in darkness, drain magical light sources first.

name: Hollow Hound
description: Emaciated, wolf-like creatures with hollow, glowing eyes and bodies that shift between mist and flesh. They hunt in silence, their forms flickering in and out of reality.
lore: <cite>"It didn't growl. It didn't snarl. It just watched. And then, it was suddenly there, sinking its fangs into my shoulder before I could even react."</cite> —Survivor of a Hollow Hound attack

stats.Attack Behavior: Hunts in packs, ambushes prey from darkness, teleports short distances when injured.
